```{r}
IPC <- read_xlsx("data/1 Districtwise IPC Crimes_2021.xlsx")
glimpse(IPC)
```

```{r}
mydata_summed <- IPC %>%
  filter(...1 == "Andhra Pradesh") %>%
  rowwise()

mydata_summed1 <- mydata_summed %>%
  summarise(total = sum(as.numeric(...6) + as.numeric(...7)))

```
